CatDescriptText: Cutline from c. 1949 - 1950 Pittsburgh Courier newspaper, article for this image reads: "Tomahawks - Members of the Tomahawks Athletic Club baseball team, who are continuing their winning ways. Front row left to right: Ray Ross, outfielder; Mal Hall, pitcher, Don Oliver, first base; Charles G. Hill, outfielder; James Robinson, pitcher; Don Moore [Ronald Moon], outfielder; Will Hawthorne, catcher. Second row, left to right: Ben Carter, third base; Leander Wright, catcher; Dwain Hampton, catcher; Walker [Walter] Valentine, shortstop; Sonny McMahon, pitcher; James Johnson, shortstop;  Alvin Powell, outfielder; David Cook, second base.
TitMainTitle: Tomahawks Athletic Club baseball team, back row: Ben Carter, Leander Wright, Dwain Hampton, Walter Valentine, Sonny McMahon, James Johnson, Alvin Powell, David Cook; front row: Ray Ross, Mal Hall, Don Oliver, Charles G. Hill, James Robinson, Ronald Moon, Will Hawthorne, posed on Schenley Field
